course_description: This course offers an in-depth study of improvisation in the jazz idiom. Topics include the study of form, patterns, vocabulary style analysis, and transcription techniques. Principles include melodic and harmonic analysis, phrase construction, and ear training.
prerequisites: This course requires MUS 240 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1030, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: G. Motley, Status: Open
